text: aur sulaimaan ke lie vaayu ko vasheebhut kar diya tha. praatah samay usaka chalana ek maheene kee raah tak aur saayankaal ko usaka chalana ek maheene kee raah tak - aur hamane usake lie pighale hue taanbe ka srot baha diya - aur jinnon mein se bhee kuchh ko (usake vasheebhoot kar diya tha,) jo apane rab kee anugya se usake aage kaam karate the. (hamaara aadesha tha,) "unamen se jo hamaare hukm se phirega use ham bhadakatee aag ka maza chakhaenge.
